attributes.action: Create a no more secrets, no more lies day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This could be the day that the government goes into it's classified documents depertment and choses some documents to declassify as a matter of good will. It could also be the day that people up and down the country are encouraged to own up to anything they might be keeping inside.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
